meanings.definition: An organized group of people with a particular purpose, such as a business or charity.
meanings.sent1: Many local organizations work together to help the community.
meanings.sent2: Non-profit organizations rely on donations to support their cause.
meanings.sent3: The organizations of squirrels in the park always seem to be planning something.
meanings.sent4: Her family was like a well-oiled machine, each member an essential part of the organization.
meanings.sent5: The organizations of ants marching in a line was a fascinating sight.

meanings.sent1: Effective organizations of events require careful planning.
meanings.sent2: The organizations of files on the computer made it easy to find what she needed.
meanings.sent3: His organization of his toy collection by color was both impressive and slightly obsessive.
meanings.sent4: The organization of ideas in her essay flowed seamlessly from one point to the next.
meanings.sent5: The organization of ingredients before cooking helped her stay focused and efficient.
